Item_Title: Running Boards for Nissan Navara NP300
Description_sample:
High-quality aluminium / strengthened ABS plastic Side Steps / Running Boards - set of 2 (Pair) for Seat Tarraco 2018 - present models. These are a high-quality items that are supplied by the main dealers, but at a much higher cost than you find here.

Dimension: 1880 mm x 140 mm

Sale is for aluminium side Running Boards - set of 2 (Pair). Fitting is done by simply removing the side skirt and bolting on to original mounting holes on your vehicle (no drilling required). These are practical sturdy and strong side board that also adds a beautiful stylish finishing touch.

Made from highest quality aluminium / strengthened ABS plastic.
Easy fitting.
Fitting kit and fitting instructions are included.
No drilling required.
Bolt on.
Sale is for Running Boards - set of 2 (Pair).
Fits Seat Tarraco 2018 - present models.
1-Year Warranty.
180KG Load rating.
For technical support please contact us via eBay messages.
These, as with all the Running Boards we sell, are made from the highest quality materials. Our Running Boards present a quality product for your vehicle at a reasonable price.

Bars are boxed, new and come complete with all the nuts, bolts and fixings necessary for fitting, no drilling is needed.

VAT Invoice, Fitting Instructions and Tracking info will be sent as an email attachment after purchase - please check spam folder if not received.

Trade enquiries welcome.
